1169456.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, then destroy 1 card you control. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Attack" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. A "Meklord" monster equipped with this card can attack twice during each Battle Phase.
1169456.name: Meklord Army Attack

1169458.effect: If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Meklord Army" monster from your Deck or GY, except this card. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Carrier" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. While this card is equipped to a "Meklord" monster, reduce the ATK/DEF of all monsters on the field by half of their original ATK/DEF.
1169458.name: Meklord Army Carrier

1169463.effect: If this card is destroyed: You can add 1 "Meklord" card from your Deck or GY to your hand, except this card. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Guard" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. While this card is equipped to a "Meklord Emperor" monster, if that monster would be destroyed, you can destroy 1 card equipped to it, instead.
1169463.name: Meklord Army Guard

1169453.effect:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 "Meklord" card in your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Top" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. A "Meklord" monster equipped with this card gains the following effect: 
● Once per turn: You can equip this card with 1 "Meklord" card from your hand or GY.
1169453.name: Meklord Army Top

1168817.effect: Until the next End Phase, while you control exactly 1 "Meklord Emperor" or "Meklord Astro" monster, treat all monsters that are in the Extra Deck or that were Summoned from the Extra Deck as Synchro Monsters for the effects of your "Meklord" cards. You can target 1 Spell/Trap card you control; add this card from your GY to your hand, then destroy that card. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Protocol Update" once per turn.
1168817.name: Meklord Protocol Update

1169445.effect: Destroy 1 other "Meklord" card you control, then Special Summon 1 "Meklord" monster with a different name from your Deck. If this card is destroyed: You can activate the effects of "Meklord Emperor" and "Meklord Astro" monsters you control as Quick Effects until the next End Phase. You can only activate 1 effect of "Meklord Quickboot" per turn, and only once that turn.
1169445.name: Meklord Quickboot

1169470.effect: If you control exactly 1 "Meklord" monster in Attack Position: Activate as Chain Link 2 or higher; that monster is unaffected by effects activated before this card in this Chain, then change it to Defense Position. If your opponent controls a Synchro Monster, you can activate this card from your hand. You can only activate 1 "Meklord Sentry Mode" per turn.
1169470.name: Meklord Sentry Mode

1957466.effect:
You can Tribute this card; apply 1 of these effects.
● You can reveal 1 "Isolde, Belle of the Underworld" and 1 "Tristan, Knight of the Underworld" from your Deck, then add 1 of those revealed monsters to your hand, and send that other revealed monster to the GY.
● Add 1 "of the Underworld" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
During your opponent's End Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can attach this card to 1 Zombie "Number" Xyz Monster as material. You can only use 1 "Perceval, Knight of the Underworld" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1957466.name: Perceval, Knight of the Underworld

1957401.effect: Banish 2 cards from your hand or field; add 1 of your banished cards to your hand, except the cards banished to activate this effect or "Early Opening of the Sarcophagus". You can only activate 1 "Early Opening of the Sarcophagus" per turn.
1957401.name: Early Opening of the Sarcophagus

1957432.effect: Discard 1 card; during the End Phase of the next turn, destroy 1 card on the field. You can only activate 1 "Future Sight" per turn.
1957432.name: Future Sight

1958133.effect: Send 1 Zombie monster with 0 DEF from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, you can Normal Summon 1 "of the Underworld" Monster during your Main Phase this turn, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) Monsters sent to the GY by this effect cannot activate their effects in the GY. You cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters or activate monster effects the turn you activate this card, except Zombie monsters. You can only activate 1 "Knights of the Underworld" per turn.
1958133.name: Knights of the Underworld

1957398.effect: Shuffle 10 of your banished cards into the Deck; draw 2 cards. You cannot activate "Pot of" Normal Spells the Duel you activate this card, except "Pot of Relief". You can only activate 1 "Pot of Relief" per turn.

1957423.effect: If the equipped monster is a monster you control, any battle damage it inflicts to your is opponent is doubled. If not, any battle damage it inflicts to you is halved. If this face-up card is sent from the field to the GY: Pay 800 LP; place this card on either the top or bottom of your Deck.

1958136.effect: Add 1 Zombie monster with 0 DEF from your Deck to your hand. If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card and send 1 card from your hand or field to the GY; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Number C23: Lancelot, Knight King of the Underworld" by using 1 "Number 23: Lancelot, Dark Knight of the Underworld" you control with no materials attached as material. 1957404.effect: Send 1 face-up Continuous, Equip, or Field Spell you control to the GY; draw 2 cards. You can only activate 1 "Trap Planter" per turn.

During each Battle Phase, this card can make attacks on monsters up to the number of Equip Cards you control +1. This card gains 500 ATK/DEF for each Equip Card you control. You can only control 1 "Ben Kei, the Armed Spellsword".

1957988.effect:
3 Level 9 monsters
This Xyz Summoned card can attack your opponent directly. While this card has material, your opponent cannot target it with card effects. If this card has a "Number 23: Lancelot, Dark Knight of the Underworld" monster as material, it gains this effect.

1218423.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects, also, after that, Set this card face-down instead of sending it to the GY. You can only use 1 of followings effects of "Blackclaws Rest" once per turn.
● if a face-up "Blackclaw" monster you control is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect; gain LP equal to that monster's original DEF, and if you do, shuffle it into the Deck.

● Target 1 face-up "Blackclaw" monster on the field; ATK/DEF target's become equal to its combined original ATK and DEF until the end of this turn, and if the target is in Attack Position at the End Phase, change the target in Defense Position.

1218767.effect: If you control a "Blackclaw" monster: Target Set cards in your opponent's field, up to the number of "Blackclaw" monsters you control; destroy them. If you control min. 2 "Blackclaw" Synchro Monsters, you can activate this card from your hand.

This card gains 200 ATK for each "Blackclaw" monster in your GY. If this card is targeted by an opponent's effect: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. When this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Blackclaw" monster in your GY, except Synchro Monster; Special Summon it.

1957292.effect:
1 Level 5 or higher "Catacomb" monster + 1 "Catacomb" monster
Must be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by sending the above monsters you control to the GY (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). Cannot be destroyed by battle. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles a Special Summoned monster: You can destroy that monster. If this card is in your GY: You can send 1 "Catacomb" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Royal Volken" once per turn.
1957292.name: Catacomb Royal Volken

1957344.effect:
2+ "Catacomb" monsters
If a "Catacomb" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to a zone this card points to: That monster(s) gains 300 ATK/DEF. When a monster declares an attack: You can target 1 "Catacomb" monster in your GY or that is banished: Special Summon it. If this card is in your GY: You can send 1 "Catacomb" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Leader Cedric" once per turn.
1957344.name: Catacomb Leader Cedric

1957332.effect:
2+ "Catacomb" monsters
Your opponent cannot target "Catacomb" monsters for attacks, except this one. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Catacomb" card from your Deck to your hand. (Quick Effect): You can return any number of monsters you control that this card points to, then target the same number of cards your opponent controls; Negate their effects. If this card is in your GY: You can send 1 "Catacomb" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Leader Ravanna" once per turn.
1957332.name: Catacomb Leader Ravanna

1957557.effect:
2 "Catacomb" monsters
"Catacomb" monsters this card points to can make two attacks on monsters. If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Catacomb" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Catacomb" monsters. (Quick Effect): You can send this card to the GY; Fusion Summon 1 "Catacomb" Fusion Monster by banishing monsters from your hand or GY as Fusion Material. You can only use each effect of "Catacomb Regal Khione" once per turn.
1957557.name: Catacomb Regal Khione

1403864.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can destroy 1 "Apocrypha" monster you control or in your hand, and if you do, add 1 "Apocrypha" card from your Deck to your hand, that specifically mentions "Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity" in its' text, also you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Apocrypha" monsters. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Apocrypha" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Apocrypha Annchimedes" once per turn.
1403864.name: Apocrypha Annchimedes

1403875.effect: If an "Apocrypha" card is destroyed, you can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Special Summon 1 "Apocryphal Demon Token" (Fiend/FIRE/Level 6/ATK 1500/DEF 2400), also you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Apocrypha" monsters. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; Send 1 "Apocrypha" card from your Deck to your GY. You can use each effect of "Apocrypha Eukliade" once per turn.
1403875.name: Apocrypha Eukliade

1403871.effect: If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are "Apocrypha" monsters: You can destroy 1 "Apocrypha" card you control or in your hand, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Apocrypha" monsters. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Apocrypha Ludesmicartes" once per turn.
1403871.name: Apocrypha Ludesmicartes

1403931.effect: If an "Apocrypha" monster is destroyed by the effect of an "Apocrypha" card: Send 1 "Apocrypha" monster you control or in your hand to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can banish 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your Deck, except "Apocrypha Oinstair". If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Apocrypha" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Apocrypha Oinstair" once per turn.
1403931.name: Apocrypha Oinstair

1403934.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 "Apocrypha" monsters from your GY. "Apocrypha" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle. You can target 1 "Apocrypha" monster you control, and 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy them. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; shuffle 5 banished "Apocrypha" cards with different names into your Deck; Draw 2 cards. You can only use each effect of "Apocrypha Oniphia" once per turn.
1403934.name: Apocrypha Oniphia

1403912.effect:
If you control an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, this card gains 1000 ATK as long as an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster is face-up on the field.. You can only use each of the following effects of "Apocrypha Onizar" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Apocrypha" monsters.
● You can banish 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck; add 1 "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 "Apocrypha" card.
● You can banish 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck; Until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card's name and effects becomes that card's, and its' ATK becomes equal to that monster's.
1403912.name: Apocrypha Onizar

1404699.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Forbidden Apocrypha Chant of Armageddon". Must be Ritual Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot be used as Fusion or Link Material. (Quick Effect) You can banish any number of "Apocrypha" cards from your GY, then target an equal number of cards your opponent controls; destroy them. When this card leaves the field; Destroy all cards you control. If this Ritual Summoned card is in your GY, and you control an "Apoctypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Apocrypha" card from your Deck to your hand, then send 1 "Apocrypha" card from your hand to your GY. You can only use each effect of "Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity" once per turn.
1404699.name: Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity

1404705.effect: If you control "Apocryphais The Evil Serpent Deity", target 1 banished "Apocrypha" monster; Special Summon that monster. If an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster is Special Summoned by this effect, its' effects are negated, and it is sent to the GY during the End Phase. You can banish this card from your GY; Add 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your GY to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Apocryphal Al-Mighty Descent" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1404705.name: Apocryphal Al-Mighty Descent

1404707.effect: When this card is activated, and you control an "Apocrypha" monster; send 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your Deck to your GY, then destroy 1 card in your hand. "Apocrypha" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by your opponents' card effects. You can banish this card from your GY; You can target 2 cards you opponent controls; return them to the hand, then banish 1 card you control. Your opponent can pay 1000 LP to negate this effect. You can only use 1 effect of "Apocryphal Manuscripts of Apocryphais" per turn.
1404707.name: Apocryphal Manuscripts of Apocryphais

1404703.effect: Discard 1 card; Add 1 "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster and 1 Level 4 or lower "Apocrypha" monster from your Deck to your hand, then banish 1 "Apocrypha" card from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY: Send 1 "Apocrypha" card from your Deck to your GY. You can only use 1 "Chosen by the Apocryphal Deuce" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1404703.name: Chosen by the Apocryphal Deuce

1405234.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon "Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity". You must also Tribute 2 or more "Apocrypha" monsters with different names from your hand or field whose total ATK equal or exceed 3500. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 non-Ritual "Apocrypha" monster from your GY. You can only use 1 effect of "Forbidden Apocrypha Chant of Armageddon" per turn.
1405234.name: Forbidden Apocrypha Chant of Armageddon

1404711.effect: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated while you control an "Apocrypha" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card. You can banish this card from your GY; add to your hand 1 of your "Apocrypha" monsters that is banished or in your Deck. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Apocrypha" monsters. You can only use 1 "Apocryphal Annihilation" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1404711.name: Apocryphal Annihilation

1404716.effect:
If you control an "Apocrypha" Ritual Monster, you can activate this card from your hand. You can only use 1 of "Apocrypha Forbidden Alchemy" per turn, and only once that turn.
● You can target 1 "Apocrypha" monster you control; destroy it, then your opponent must give control of 1 monster they control to you. That monster's name becomes "Apocryphal Sacrifice", and it's effects are negated. 
● You can banish 1 card from your hand; draw 1 card.
● You can banish this card from your GY; Send 2 "Apocrypha" cards from your Deck to your GY.
1404716.name: Apocryphal Forbidden Alchemy

1591016.effect: 2 "Apocrypha" monstersYou can banish 1 "Apocrypha" monster from your GY; Set 1 "Apocrypha" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Apoctypha" monster (Quick Effect): Banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Apocryphais, The Evil Serpent Deity" and 1 "Apocrypha" Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Apocrypha" monsters. You can only use 1 effect of "Apocryphal Descendant Archenem" per turn, and only once that turn.
1591016.name: Apocryphal Descendant Archenem
